import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { GroupTaskListService } from 'src/services/group-task-list-service/group-task-list.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-boardcontent', templateUrl: './boardcontent.component.html', styleUrls: ['./boardcontent.component.css'], providers: [GroupTaskListService] }) export class BoardcontentComponent implements OnInit { collapse: string[] = []; constructor(public group_task_list_service: GroupTaskListService) {}; ngOnInit(): void { this.group_task_list_service.getGroupTaskList(); } } <<<<<<< HEAD
